docs.title: Welcome to Psuedo's Random Docs
docs.text: There will just be random stuff here.

docs.title: 🧭 So You Wanna Join
docs.text: Welcome aboard! Here’s everything you need to get started with our modded Minecraft server.

docs.title: 📦 Step 2 — Import the Modpack
docs.text:
1. Open the CurseForge app.
  2. Go to Minecraft → My Modpacks.
  3. Click Import (located in the top left).
  4. Click Choose .zip file.
  5. Select the downloaded file DILK.zip.
  6. Wait for the installation to finish.

docs.title: 🚀 Step 3 — Launch the Modpack
docs.text: Once it’s installed, just click Play in CurseForge! It’ll automatically launch Minecraft with all the right mods.

docs.title: 🌐 Step 4 — Join the Server
docs.text:
When Minecraft opens, go to Multiplayer → Add Server and enter:

minecraft.psuedo.dev:25569

docs.title: 📝 It won’t let me join the server! It says I need to be whitelisted.
docs.text: You must be whitelisted to join. Ping someone in the community (or ask an admin) to get added.

docs.title: 🔧 It says my mods are different or missing.
docs.text: This usually means your modpack is outdated. Make sure you’ve downloaded the latest version of the pack from this page and re-imported it in CurseForge.

docs.title: 🌐 Connection timed out / can’t connect.
docs.text:
• Make sure the IP is entered exactly as shown: 
    minecraft.psuedo.dev:25569
